name: Dead Pools
description:
You're an engineer sent to a dried-up lake to fix some broken infrastructure in the far future. You have a unique device (the Resonolocator) that helps you navigate using objects that resonate with certain locations. 

You're free to explore and discover the dead lake's secrets for yourself, or you can fix the pipe and get out as quickly as you can.

This game was developed in less than a week by game dev students for the Apocalypse Game Jam.

Credits: Darren, Pragya, Can & Ed

Sound & Music: all sounds and music are downloaded from https://mixkit.co/

  • Sound: Deep Air Woosh, Game Gun Shot, Scary Graveyard Wind, Stones and Rocks Falling, Swoosh Wind Passing, Writing on a Stone 
  • Music: Desert Ambience, Goats (song)
